means: 降低（自己[某事物]）的身价，贬低

sentence.Network_en: I don't want anything to cheapen what we've found.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不希望任何事情使我们的发现变得粗俗.

sentence.Network_en: You just can't afford to let her hang - ups cheapen our relationship.
sentence.Network_cn: 你也不应该毫不容情地让她成为阻止我们相好的障碍.

sentence.Network_en: Again and again to leave and escape will only cheapen yourself.
sentence.Network_cn: 一次次的离开和逃避只会让自己变得廉价.

PerfectNetExp.abs: cum.的意思中文翻译 ... cheap-jack 兜售便宜货的叫卖小贩 cheapen 减价, 跌价 cheap labor policy 低工资政策.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... ChE 胆碱脂酶 cheapen 变得粗俗 cheat 欺诈.
最新实用英汉国际金融词典 - MBA智库文档 ... charge forward 费用先付 cheapen 杀价, 跌价 charge income 收益支出.

list.abs: The cheapened shorts only cost 10 dollars ., 大减价的短裤只卖 10 美元.
Using bad language will cheapen yourself . Never yell at anyone else ., 用脏话 , 会贬低自己 , 不可对任何人高喊大叫.
You mustn ' t cheapen yourself ., 你不可自贬身价.
packaging is cheapened , chemical formulations altered , sanitary standards curtailed , and on and on , in a series of continual product debasements .例如使用廉价的包装，改变化学成分，降低卫生标准，等等等等，一系列的产品持续退化过程。
The flood of imported cars cheapened the cost of cars made here ., 大量涌入的进口汽车使本地产的汽车价格下跌.

entry.tran: 使有失身价;使降低身份;使贬值
entry.def: If something cheapens a person or thing, it lowers their reputation or position.

example.ex: When America boycotted the Moscow Olympics it cheapened the medals won...
example.tran: 美国抵制莫斯科奥运会的行为使金牌的含金量降低了。

example.ex: Love is a word cheapened by overuse.
example.tran: “爱”这个字眼用得太滥不值钱了。

means.word_mean: 1. lower the grade of something; reduce its worth

auth_sentence.content: Does the service cheapen the idea of sex?
auth_sentence.res_content: Does the service cheapen the idea of sex?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Does the service cheapen the idea of sex?

auth_sentence.content: Washington debases our currency, deliberately engineering a false balance to cheapen their debts and silently seize our wealth.
auth_sentence.res_content: Washington debases our currency, deliberately engineering a false balance to cheapen their debts and silently seize our wealth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Washington debases our currency, deliberately engineering a false balance to cheapen their debts and silently seize our wealth.
